name: ieGeekCam
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
ieGeek Cam skill can only work with certain AC powered Wi-Fi cameras, not all cameras using ieGeek CamAPP can use ieGeek Cam skill, please consult the sellers if your product can support Alexa before using this skill.

To get started, please follow the steps below:
1. Install ieGeek Cam App from App Store and Google Play, connect the camera to ieGeek Cam App, keep it online and running.
2. Find ieGeek Cam Skill in Alexa App, click "Enable Skill" to link your camera with the Alexa account, then find your camera.
3. Try voice commands like "Alexa, show the living room" to get live videos and check everything's fine in your sweet home.
